channel.title: How do I change the Xp
channel.description: How do I change the xp my character gets when he searches the hay stack for defence xp, closes the door for strength xp, and attacks the dummies for attack xp?

item.title: How do I change the Xp
item.dc:creator: @Rrie Rrie
item.description:
@Rrie wrote:

case 823:
if (actionTimer == 0) {
sendMessage(“You hit the mess out of that thing!!”);
setAnimation(0x326);
addSkillXP((10000playerLevel[0]), 0);
addSkillXP((10000playerLevel[3]), 3);
addSkillXP((10000*playerLevel[18]), 18);
actionTimer = 12;
}
break;[br][size=1]Posted on: June 03, 2007, 10:47:03 AM[/size][hr]That’s what I did to it. the default had 600xp

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change the Xp

item.title: How do I change the Xp
item.dc:creator: @Rrie Rrie
item.description:
@Rrie wrote:

Ok! That Helps with the dummies. Now I just can’t find the Strength xp thing for closing the door and the haystack! Thx much!

Just give case number and I’ll be good?!?!

I’m on server PimpScape

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change the Xp

item.title: How do I change the Xp
item.dc:creator: @Owniemage Owniemage
item.description:
@Owniemage wrote:

Depends on what source you have, But mine is based of Satanisle…

Open client.java and search for:

case 2874:

There you will see:

case 2874: if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You train Strenght !"); actionTimer = 53; setAnimation(2555); addSkillXP((100*playerLevel[2]), 2); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } break;

Change the 100 in addSkillXP((100*playerLevel[2]), 2); to whatever you want!
Some other cases under and above these one can be edited too!

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change the Xp

Then scroll down says: addSkillXp((####) Change that to whatever
